title: Documents, email, web pages unable to print or save to PDF while using FireFox 115.0esr after update installed
content:
Before installing recent update (115.32.0 esr) I had no problems to print to Brother MFC-7360 printer or Save to PDF; now, neither of these selections will perform their function. I have tested the printer and can print a Windows Printer Test Page ; I can also print using Windows Reader. Please advise what I can do to correct this issue with the latest version of FireFox 115.32.0 esr. I even tried the "clear saved print settings" in the "more trouble shooting information" ; "printer"; "troubleshooting"; I don't think that did anything.

Thank you.
creator: dcianelli3

title: lost bookmarks
content:
so i had a bunch of bookmarks saved, and when i logged in today they are gone, replaced with a message For quick access, place your bookmarks here on the bookmarks toolbar. manage bookmarks (link)

so when I use the link I cant restore bookmarks, cant seem to save new bookmarks, and the FAQ section isnt helping, some of the stps they talk about are greyed out in my version, so I cant click on them etc.

Is this a windows 10 issue? Am I the only one having this problem?
creator: tobecooper0

title: Yahoo mail
content: I am unable to sign in to my yahoo mail account. It gives me a fault that "something went wrong, please try another device". I can use brave as my browser and sign in with no problem but not with firefox. Any idea why?
creator: dmcpicman

title: error message when I want to see bookmarks
content:
Error message: the bookmarks and history system will no be functional because one of Firefox's files is in use by another application. Some security software can cause this problem.

I tried following the directions in "learn more" but to no avail. Please help this senior citizen get his bookmarks back! Thank you.
creator: bikerman1

title: Unable to copy or from Firefox browser
content:
Hi,

Unable to copy text from Firefox browser. This includes copying from the body of a webpage, webpage URL in the address bar and "about:support" Troubleshooting information.

Behaviour: When copying the selected text, nothing is pasted. When cutting the text, (text is removed where possible ie address bar, or text fields), nothing is pasted.

I am able to paste from a different program into Firefox ie from Notepad to Firefox.

Attempted fix: I have tried refreshing Firefox. Problem persists.

Please assist.
creator: 94dfx

title: Shortcuts automatically appear on my home screen
content:
I manually added shortcuts to my home screen, but everytime I open the browser, the system automatically has added shortcuts I don't want. Also, when I delete these unwanted shortcuts, another unwanted one appears.

how can I stop this from happening?
creator: bacoop471

title: How can I remove the settings from my sidebar?
content:
Hi All:

I just got a new laptop and so I am getting everything set up the way that I like it. I have come across a problem with my sidebar though. I like to keep my bookmarks up all the time, but I want them to not be too wide and take up a lot of my screen. On this new computer, there's an addition 5 cms or so of white space at the far left of the tool bar. It had different buttons on it up at the top (one of them had something to do with AI) and a little gear down at the bottom of the space. I was able to remove all of the buttons up at the top, but I can't seem to hide the whole thing. I just want to see my bookmarks, without that extra customization sidebar. Is there a way to hide the spot highlighted in pink, but still have the bookmarks visible?
creator: buabahn

title: i think google hates me

title: I can't access my network folders from Firefox file explorer
content: As I mentioned I can't seem to access my network folders. I only have this issue in this machine but I have my account on 3 different machines on the network with no issues. All have the same extensions and settings.
